functionDecorators.name: changeDependentContractAddress
functionDecorators.description: Iupgradable Interface to update dependent contract address.

functionDecorators.name: internalLiquiditySwap
functionDecorators.description: Internal Swap of assets between Capital and Investment Sub pool for excess or insufficient liquidity conditions of a given currency.

functionDecorators.name: saveIADetails
functionDecorators.description: Saves a given investment asset details. To be called daily.

parameterDecorators.name: rate
parameterDecorators.description: array of investment asset exchange rate.

functionDecorators.name: upgradeInvestmentPool
functionDecorators.description: On upgrade transfer all investment assets and ether to new Investment Pool.

functionDecorators.name: _getCurrencyAssetsBalance
functionDecorators.description: Gets currency asset balance for a given currency name.

functionDecorators.name: changeUniswapFactoryAddress
functionDecorators.description: to change the uniswap factory address.

parameterDecorators.name: newFactoryAddress
parameterDecorators.description: is the new factory address in concern.

functionDecorators.name: externalLiquidityTrade
functionDecorators.description: External Trade for excess or insufficient liquidity conditions of a given currency.
